SEARCH
Package org.fluentjdbc

Interface DatabaseQueryable<T extends DatabaseQueryable<T>>

All Known Subinterfaces:
DatabaseQueryBuilder<T>, DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder<T>, DatabaseTable, DbContextListableSelect<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder, DatabaseSqlBuilder, DatabaseTableImpl, DatabaseTableQueryBuilder, DatabaseTableWithTimestamps, DatabaseWhereBuilder, DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder, DbContextSelectBuilder, DbContextSqlBuilder, DbContextTable
public interface DatabaseQueryable<T extends DatabaseQueryable<T>>
Interface to build WHERE-expressions for SELECT-statements. Usage: 
 table
     .where("firstName", firstName)
     .whereExpression("lastName like ?", "joh%")
     .whereIn("status", statuses)
     .orderBy("lastName")
     .list(...)

    query()

  • Method Details

    • where

      T where(DatabaseQueryParameter parameter)
      Adds the parameter to the WHERE-clause and all the parameter list. E.g. where(new DatabaseQueryParameter("created_at between ? and ?", List.of(earliestDate, latestDate)))

    • where

      @CheckReturnValue default T where(String fieldName, @Nullable Object value)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query

    • where

      @CheckReturnValue default T where(DatabaseColumnReference column, @Nullable Object value)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query

    • whereExpressionWithParameterList

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereExpressionWithParameterList(String expression, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list. E.g. whereExpressionWithParameterList("created_at between ? and ?", List.of(earliestDate, latestDate))

    • whereExpression

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereExpression(String expression, @Nullable Object parameter)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and the value to the parameter list. E.g. whereExpression("created_at > ?", earliestDate)

    • whereColumnValuesEqual

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereColumnValuesEqual(String column, String expression, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list. E.g. whereColumnValues("json_column", "?::json", jsonString)

    • whereExpression

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereExpression(String expression)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause

    • whereOptional

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereOptional(String fieldName, @Nullable Object value)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query unless value is null

    • whereOptional

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereOptional(DatabaseColumnReference column, @Nullable Object value)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query unless value is null

    • whereIn

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereIn(String fieldName, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName in (?, ?, ?)" to the query. If the parameter list is empty, instead adds WHERE fieldName <> fieldName, resulting in no rows being returned.

    • whereIn

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereIn(DatabaseColumnReference fieldName, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName in (?, ?, ?)" to the query. If the parameter list is empty, instead adds WHERE fieldName <> fieldName, resulting in no rows being returned.

    • whereAll

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereAll(List<String> fields, List<Object> values)
      For each field adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query

    • whereAll

      @CheckReturnValue default T whereAll(Map<String,?> fields)
      For each key and value adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query

    • query

      @CheckReturnValue T query()
      Returns or creates a query object to be used to add where(String, Object) statements and operations
